post.description:
Endpoint for notifying the API about battle events or any other data.

Notice, that the field type is required and determines the type of the data.

Notice that the type also determines shape of the body. Examples, for each type can be found in request examples section.

### Type field
#### result

Result of the battle, all players of the battle should send this data.

Notice that team1 and team2 should hold game's player's _id fields.

As a response for winners an access token will be returned, which can be used when stealing Items from losed Clan's SoulHome.
Notice that the steal token will expire after some period of time. Losers will get 403 error = they can not get the steal token.

The steal token can be used only by the winner's Clan's members for the loser's Clan Stock.

You can see the process flow from [this diagram](https://github.com/Alt-Org/Altzone-Server/tree/dev/doc/img/game_results)

delete.description:
Delete Player by its _id field. Notice that only Player, which belongs to loggen-in user Profile can be deleted.
In case when the Player is the only admin in some Clan and the Clan has some other Players, the Player can not be removed.
User should be asked to first determine at least one admin for the Clan.

Also, it is not recommended to delete the Player since it can itroduce unexpected behaviour for the user with Profile,
but without Player. The better way to remove the Player is do it via /profile DELETE.

Player removal basically means removing all data, which is related to the Player:
CustomCharacters, Clan, except for the Profile data.
In the case when the Profile does not have a Player, user can only login to the system, but can not play the game.

get.summary: Get soulhome data from which items can be stolen

post.description:
Steal Items from the loser Clan's SoulHome. The stolen Items will be automatically added to a specified Room of the winners Clan's SoulHome.

Notice that at first a steal token should be obtained by the winner player(s) from the /gameData/battle POST endpoint with body type "result",
while informing about game result.

Requests without the steal token or with an expired token will get 403 as a response.

Notice that only found SoulHome Items will be stolen.
It is possible that some other player already has stoled some of the specified Items, in this case these Items will be ignored since they can not be stolen twice.

You can see the process flow from [this diagram](https://github.com/Alt-Org/Altzone-Server/tree/dev/doc/img/game_results)

This will start a voting in the Clan from which Item is being moved to the flea marked.
Voting min approval percentage is 51. During the voting an Item is in "Shipping" status and can not be bought by other players.

Notice that the player must be in the same clan and it must have a basic right "Shop".

Notice that if a FleaMarketItem has already "Shipping" status 403 will be returned.

Buy an Item from the flea market.
This will start a voting in the Clan for which Item is being purchased.
Voting duration is 10 min at max and the min approval percentage is 51.
During the voting an Item is in "Booked" status and can not be bought by other players.

Notice that the player must be in the same clan and it must have a basic right "Shop".

Notice that if a FleaMarketItem has already "Booked" status 403 will be returned.

Notice, that if there was nobody in the Clan with all assosiated objects will be removed.

post.description:
Endpoint uploads a log file and save on the server.

The file will be saved to the folder with name corresponding to the date when it was uploaded, i.e. 1-9-2024.

File name must be unique and therefore its name will contain date, time, Player _id and a random string, i.e. 1-9-2024_14-45-12_667eedc9b3b5bf0f7a840ef1_123456.log

Notice that the request must have a Secret header which holds a password for such requests.

Notice that if the Battle-Id header is not defined the current timestamp will be used instead.

Notice that the request must be in multipart/form-data format, where field name containing the file is "logFile"

The player is considered to be online if he / she has made a request to this endpoint at least once a 5 min.

So it is recommended to make requests to this endpoint every 4-5 min to properly track the players being online, although not often than that.

Notice that item are rotated on every server restart and every day

post.description:
Buy an item from a clan shop.

Notice that the item will not be bought right away, but before majority of clan members should vote to buy the item.

There should be also enough coins to buy an item.

Notice that the player must be in the same clan and it must have a basic right "Shop"

info.title: Altzone API
info.description:
This swagger document is describing endpoint in more details and includes the request objects structure, examples, authorization rules and any other additional information.
Notice, that it does not include common rules and functions, since they are covered on the wiki pages in GitHub

tags.name: in-development
tags.description: Endpoint is currently changing or not yet implemented

tags.name: DailyTasks
tags.description: In-game tasks for Player to do daily, weekly, monthly

tags.name: FleaMarket
tags.description: Flea market, place where Clans can sell own items or buy other's.

tags.name: ClanShop
tags.description: Clan shop, place where clans can buy items to decorate their soul homes

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the error

message.description: Message specifies why error happened, for developers "FYI"

field.description: On what field the error happen (if the field is possible to define), mostly found in validation errors

value.description: Value of the field (only if the field is specified), mostly found in validation errors

additional.description:
Any additional data provided.
For example if the error is thrown by some method and is UNEXPECTED, when this field should contain the thrown error

stealToken.description: Token required to steal items after a won battle

soulHome_id.description: Soul home ID where items can be stolen

roomIds.description: Rooms _ids where items can be stolen

duration.description: Duration of the battle in seconds

winnerTeam.description: Number of the winning team (1 or 2)

startedVotings.description: Number of votings initiated by this player

participatedVotings.description: Number of votings the player has participated in

logoType.description: Type of the logo used by the clan

pieceColors.description: Colors used in the logo, defined as hex codes

_id.description: Unique identifier of the clan role

name.description: Human-readable name of the role, must be unique for a clan

_id.description: Unique ID of the custom character

size.description: Character size value (affects hitbox or visuals)

player_id.description: Player ID who owns this custom character

Player.description: Player object who owns this custom character

skinColor.description: Avatar skin color in HEX format

_id.description: Unique player ID

clan_id.description: Clan ID this player belongs to

clanRole_id.description: ID of the role the player holds in the clan

_id.description: Unique ID of the room

isActive.description: Whether the room is currently active

hasLift.description: Whether the room has a lift feature

deactivationTimestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when the room will be deactivated

cellCount.description: Number of interactive cells in the room

soulHome_id.description: ID of the parent Soul Home

_id.description: Unique identifier of the item

price.description: Price of the item in in-game currency

isFurniture.description: Whether the item is a piece of furniture

stock_id.description: ID of the stock storing this item

Stock.description: Full stock object containing this item

room_id.description: ID of the room containing the item

Room.description: Full room object containing this item

_id.description: Unique ID of the stock

cellCount.description: Total number of cells in this stock

clan_id.description: ID of the clan associated with this stock

Item.description: Items currently stored in this stock

clan_id.description: ID of the clan that owns this Soul Home

_id.description: Unique identifier for the Soul Home

Room.description: List of rooms contained in the Soul Home

Clan.description: Clan that owns this Soul Home

_id.description: Unique identifier of the clan

labels.description: List of labels describing the clan.

gameCoins.description: Amount of game coins the clan owns

points.description: Total points accumulated by the clan

admin_ids.description: List of user IDs that are administrators of the clan

playerCount.description: Number of players currently in the clan

itemCount.description: Number of items stored by the clan

stockCount.description: Number of stock units the clan owns

ageRange.description: Allowed age range for clan members

goal.description: Goal or purpose of the clan

language.description: Preferred language used in the clan

isOpen.description: Indicates if members can join the clan without admin approvals

skinColor.description: Skin color as a hex string

uniqueIdentifier.description: Unique player identifier (e.g., device ID or user ID)

above13.description: Whether the player confirms being over 13 years old

parentalAuth.description: Whether the player has parental authorization

battleCharacter_ids.description: Battle character IDs linked to the player (max 3)

currentAvatarId.description: ID of the currently selected avatar variant

avatar.description: Custom avatar setup for this player

characterId.description: Base character ID used as a template

level.description: Starting level of the custom character

_id.description: ID of the custom character to update

name.description: Unique name of the clan (max 20 characters).

tag.description: Short tag used to identify the clan.

labels.description: List of labels describing the clan (max 5).

goal.description: Optional goal or focus of the clan.

language.description: Preferred language used in the clan.

labels.description: Updated labels for the clan (max 5, optional)

admin_idsToDelete.description: Player IDs to be removed from clan administrators (optional)

isOpen.description: Whether the clan is open to join without admin approval (optional)

ageRange.description: Age range restriction for clan members (optional)

goal.description: Goal or focus of the clan (optional)

_id.description: ID of the item to update

_id.description: Unique ID of the room to update

cellCount.description: Updated number of cells in the room

item_ids.description: IDs of items to be stolen

_id.description: Unique identifier of the flea market item

material.description: List of materials used in the item

unityKey.description: Unity engine key for referencing the item

isFurniture.description: Whether the item is a piece of furniture

price.description: Price of the item in coins

clan_id.description: ID of the clan that owns the item

player_id.description: ID of the player who started the vote

choice.description: The choice the player made in the vote (e.g., APPROVE or REJECT)

voting_id.description: The ID of the voting event the vote is being added to

choice.description: The player's chosen vote option for the item

password.description: Password for the profile (should be hashed before storing)

Player.description: Optional player data to associate with this profile

_id.description: Unique ID of the claimed account

backpackCapacity.description: Maximum number of items the player's backpack can hold

above13.description: Whether the player is above 13 years old

parentalAuth.description: Whether parental authorization has been granted

gameStatistics.description: Game statistics related to this account

battleCharacter_ids.description: List of character IDs available to the player

currentAvatarId.description: ID of the currently selected avatar

clan_id.description: ID of the clan the player belongs to

CustomCharacter.description: Custom characters created by the player

accessToken.description: Access token to authenticate future API requests

count.description: The count of messages on the given date.

playedBattles.description: In how much battles the player participated in total

wonBattles.description: How much battles the player won in total

diamondsAmount.description: How much diamonds the player collected in total

startedVotings.description: How much votings the player started in total

participatedVotings.description: In how much battles the player participated in total

name.description: Unique for clan name of the role

rights.description: Object with basic rights that the role has
